member.summary: The TRIVERTEX structure contains color information and position information.

member.name: TRIVERTEX.x
member.summary: The x-coordinate, in logical units, of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.

member.name: TRIVERTEX.y
member.summary: The y-coordinate, in logical units, of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.

member.name: TRIVERTEX.Red
member.summary: The color information at the point of x, y.
